== Tools ==

 * MySQL database
 * Java *jdk*

== Steps ==

 * Download the code from the source page.
 * Use *_mvn assembly:assembly_* command at the pom level.

java -jar yahoo-0.0.5-SNAPSHOT-jar-with-dependencies.jar *dbhost dbport dbname YAHOO_MARKET_DATA dbuser dbpwd*
